entry.title: Inuyama Castle・犬山城
entry.content:
A boat on the Kiso River near Inuyama Castle and Mt. Igiyama, at dusk.

夕暮れの犬山城近くの木曽川に浮かぶ一艘の船。背後には伊木山がある。
entry.summary: A boat on the Kiso River near Inuyama Castle and Mt. Igiyama, at dusk.

entry.title: Kyoto Prefectural Library・京都府立図書館

link.title: Kyoto Prefectural Library・京都府立図書館

entry.content:
The Kyoto Prefectural Library is one of many western style buildings built at the beginning of the 20th Century that still exist in Kyoto. Opened in 1909, the library sustained damage in the 1995 Hanshin (Kobe) Earthquake. It was completely rebuilt in 2000 while maintaining the original façade. The basement, shown in the lower half of this photo is completely new, and looks out onto a small subterranean garden.

京都府立図書館は、20世紀初頭に建てられた西洋風の建築物のひとつで、京都には今でも残っている。1909年に開館したこの図書館は、1995年の阪神淡路大震災で被害を受けた。2000年に全面的に再建され、元の外観はそのままに保たれた。この写真の下半分に写っている地下部分は完全に新しく、小さな庭に面している。
entry.summary: The Kyoto Prefectural Library is one of many western style buildings built at the beginning of the 20th Century that still exist in Kyoto. Opened in 1909, the library sustained damage in the 1995 Hanshin (Kobe) Earthquake. It was completely rebuilt in 2000 while maintaining the original façade. The basement, shown in the lower half of this photo is completely new, and looks out onto a small subterranean garden.

entry.title: Randen Garage・嵐電車庫
entry.content:
Some of the motley crew of streetcars used on the Keifuku Randen Line. I love the squiggly tracks to get the streetcars in and out of the garage.

京福嵐電線で使用されているさまざまな路面電車の一部。路面電車を車庫に出し入れするための曲がりくねった線路が大好きだ。
entry.summary: Some of the motley crew of streetcars used on the Keifuku Randen Line. I love the squiggly tracks to get the streetcars in and out of the garage.

entry.title: Golden Afternoon・黄金の午後
entry.content:
Beautiful light along the Kamogawa river near Shimogamo Shrine.

下鴨神社近くの鴨川沿いの美しい光。
entry.summary: Beautiful light along the Kamogawa river near Shimogamo Shrine.

entry.title: Textures・テクスチャー
entry.content:
Walking around after a rain, I came across this bicycle and wood-clad home.

雨上がりに歩いていると、この自転車と木で覆われた家に出くわした。
entry.summary: Walking around after a rain, I came across this bicycle and wood-clad home.

entry.title: Higanbana・彼岸花
entry.content:
It's October, the Sagano fields are being harvested and the smell of smoke is in the air. Farmers often plant Spider Lillies (Higanbana) at the edge of their fields and that's what I was able to photograph today.

10月に入り、嵯峨野の田畑では収穫が進み、燻したような匂いが漂い始めている。農家では田畑の縁に彼岸花を植えることが多く、今日はその写真を撮ることができた。
entry.summary: It's October, the Sagano fields are being harvested and the smell of smoke is in the air. Farmers often plant Spider Lillies (Higanbana) at the edge of their fields and that's what I was able to photograph today.

entry.title: Sanjo Ohashi & Kamogawa・三条大橋と鴨川

link.title: Sanjo Ohashi & Kamogawa・三条大橋と鴨川

entry.content:
The illuminated Sanjo Ohashi Bridge and riverfront restaurants are reflected in the Kamogawa River, against the dark blue sky.

ライトアップされた三条大橋と川沿いのレストランが鴨川に映っている。空は夕暮れの深い青色だ。
entry.summary: The illuminated Sanjo Ohashi Bridge and riverfront restaurants are reflected in the Kamogawa River, against the dark blue sky.

entry.title: The Mothership・宇宙船
entry.content:
Night view of the Tokyo Metropolitan Gymnasium in Jingu Gaien. Built in 1954, it was used as a venue for the 1964 & 2020 Olympic Games. Rebuilt in the 1980s into the current futuristic design by architect Fumihiko Maki. Shot on Fujicolor Superia 400 film.

神宮外苑の東京体育館の夜景。1954年に建てられ、1964年と2020年のオリンピックの会場として使用された。1980年代に建築家の槇文彦氏によって現在の未来的なデザインに建て直された。
entry.summary: Night view of the Tokyo Metropolitan Gymnasium in Jingu Gaien. Built in 1954, it was used as a venue for the 1964 & 2020 Olympic Games. Rebuilt in the 1980s into the current futuristic design by architect Fumihiko Maki. Shot on Fujicolor Superia 400 film.

entry.title: Arashiyama Fireworks・嵐山花火
entry.content:
A short fireworks set on the bank of Katsura River. Behind is Mt. Arashi and the Togetsu bridge.

桂川の河川敷で打ち上げられる短い花火。背後には嵐山と渡月橋が見える。
entry.summary: A short fireworks set on the bank of Katsura River. Behind is Mt. Arashi and the Togetsu bridge.

entry.title: Kyoto Monochrome・京都モノ語
entry.content:
Evening on Kiyamachi Street, shot on the classic street photography film, Kodak Tri-X 400.

木屋町通りの夜、古典的なストリート写真用フィルム、コダック・Tri-X400で撮影。
entry.summary: Evening on Kiyamachi Street, shot on the classic street photography film, Kodak Tri-X 400.
